column2:
# Assuming 'df' is your data frame

# Create a table with kable
tbl <- kable(df) %>%
  
  # Apply styling options
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, position = "center", latex_options = c("striped", "hold_position")) %>%
  
  # Specify font size for the header row (row_spec)
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, color = "white", background = "gray") %>%
  
  # Specify font size for all other cells (cell_spec)
  cell_spec(cols_everything(), "font-size", 12)

# Print the table
print(tbl)
